title: Issho ni Training: Training with Hinako

alternative_titles.ja: いっしょにとれーにんぐ

synopsis:
One day while watching an interesting anime, Hinako is suddenly transported into the TV, turning her into an animated character! After realizing that she has an audience, Hinako instructs her viewer on the basics of physical fitness. She shares some of her techniques for staying in shape. These include squats, push-ups, and sit-ups.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
